metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3190 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Infinite loop in the F5 Ethernet Trailer protocol dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 to 3.6.7 and 3.4.0 to 3.4.15 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 4.0.3-1
libwireshark16 - 4.0.3-1
libwiretap13 - 4.0.3-1
libwsutil14 - 4.0.3-1
tshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark-common - 4.0.3-1
wireshark-gtk - 4.0.3-1
wireshark-qt - 4.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-1').
